venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Looking for an inexpensive reading with a psychic or medium?  The KRI Center
for Consciousness Studies will be hosting a Psychic Clinic the first Sunday
of every month from 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM.  A warm and open environment where
you can meet readers of varying techniques and skill levels, this is a great
event to attend if you have never had a reading and are curious to see what
it’s all about, or if you are seeking intuitive input regarding your life
path.

Also, if you are a reader and would like the opportunity to participate as a
practitioner in a psychic clinic, please contact  vroy@kripara.com for further information
on how to become a clinic reader.

Attendance is By Donation
item.name: Psychic Clinic
